channel.title: BlackBerry - Scape [Allstar]
channel.description:
Hi there,
My name is Johus and I'm new into server like allstar, I've always enjoyed playing them, but now i though it's my time to try running one & coding it. Please don't flame on my topic I'm new into this, atleast five me a chance make it the best for everyone :). Every here is explained the best as I can, I'm from Holland(Netherlands) so my English Grammar would suck prob xD.
--> server.
Client: We'd currently just use a simple IP changer, the Blackberry - Scape client in under built mode, we're currently adding new NPC into our game, such as Energy Spring which is related to our Runecrafting skill witch will have a great update very soon. You can find our status of the client here:
status: adding NPCs Modeling new Items related to Rcing adding or editing objects ingame and adding action ingame.
server:
Our server is BRAND new and we're currently making the "best" rcing or newest rcing skill into our allstar server, so there isn't really much done yet. To players who are intereste in viewing our new RCing skill (BETA) can sign- up in-game. You can talk our NPC and the NPC will give you a scroll with information about the new RC skill. This aslo means that the client WILL update, in other words, if you like to be a BETA tester of our RCING, you'll have to download our client constandly to view the updates & more.
status: coding NPCs actions related to RCing. Coding new location of the RC.
vid of the new rcing(not finished skill vid):
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=At_FuLDmM-c&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
hehe, there we are finally my last words,
ENJOY YOUR DAMN STAY.
Jesus(Owner).
BlackBerry.no-ip.info *-- we make your life better :) --* Jesus is currently: ONLINE

item.title: BlackBerry - Scape [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @BlackBerry_894 BlackBerry 894
item.description:
@BlackBerry_894 wrote:

Guardianman5:

Glad to see that I have started the comeback to allstar servers! Good Luck to you with your server! Mine may be going down soon because of inactive players, it’s sad but true. So I wish you the best of luck with yours, If you need any help just let me know and I can lend you a hand

Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: BlackBerry - Scape [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @BlackBerry_894 BlackBerry 894
item.description:
@BlackBerry_894 wrote:

Hi there,

My name is Johus and I’m new into server like allstar, I’ve always enjoyed playing them, but now i though it’s my time to try running one & coding it.
Please don’t flame on my topic I’m new into this, atleast five me a chance make it the best for everyone :).
Every here is explained the best as I can, I’m from Holland(Netherlands) so my English Grammar would suck prob xD.

–> server.

Client:
We’d currently just use a simple IP changer, the Blackberry - Scape client in under built mode, we’re currently adding new NPC into our game, such as Energy Spring which is related to our Runecrafting skill witch will have a great update very soon.
You can find our status of the client here:

status:
adding NPCs
Modeling new Items related to Rcing
adding or editing objects ingame and adding action ingame.

server:

Our server is BRAND new and we’re currently making the “best” rcing or newest rcing skill into our allstar server, so there isn’t really much done yet.
To players who are intereste in viewing our new RCing skill (BETA) can sign- up in-game.
You can talk our NPC and the NPC will give you a scroll with information about the new RC skill.
This aslo means that the client WILL update, in other words, if you like to be a BETA tester of our RCING, you’ll have to download our client constandly to view the updates & more.

status:
coding NPCs actions related to RCing.
Coding new location of the RC.

vid of the new rcing(not finished skill vid):

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=At_FuLDmM-c&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

hehe, there we are finally my last words,

ENJOY YOUR DAMN STAY.

Jesus(Owner).
